results.title: Johnny B Glass
results.announcement:
With the arrival of autumn I have decided to kick off the season with a sale! I am going to clear out all the pendants in the shop, with a superb $5 price cut on all pendants $10-16. Jump on some real unique and high quality art for a great price.

High quality unique glass creations! Each comes wearable with a cord and clasp. I put a personal touch into every piece and you will be getting something truly unique. These things sell great in jewelry and gift shops ect. I am available for bulk orders,contact me. I really take pride in my art and guarantee each customer a really high quality borosilicate glass pendant.

results.title: Simply Jane: Painting and Art Supplies
results.announcement: At Simply Jane, everyone is an artist.  Simple designs are great for little hands just learning to paint and older folks trying out new techniques.  The playful subject matter appeals across the generations (although the pony is especially loved by girls age 10-12!) The dragons, garden flowers, and peace signs that fill our studio can now fill your lives as well.  Enjoy!
results.sale_message:
Thanks for adding a bit of Simply Jane art to your life!  We specialize in teaching young or timid painters how to get started.  If you live nearby, stop by the Minneapolis studio anytime.  

Art is a great way to unwind, learn, and explore your creative side.  Don't worry about staying in the lines.  When you finish painting, you can use a Sharpie to reinforce the lines for a polished look.  If you plan to use your art (boxes, frames, candlesticks, etc) add a coat of polyurethane when you're done to protect the paint from chipping.  

We'd love to see a picture of your finished piece!  Submit a photo to jane@simplyjanestudio.com to be considered for the website.  

Thanks again and happy painting! 

Simply Jane 
jane@simplyjanestudio.com

results.title: Home of the Dinosaur Doggie PJ
results.announcement:
Dinosaur Doggies PJ's, Costumes, Jackets, Pants & Dresses

♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥Welcome to Paw and Purrs♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ 

All dogs want to be pampered! We make items from x-small to x-large breed dogs (From Yorkies to Golden Retreivers & Labs). 

We have two great dogs, Cindy LuLu our 12 year old rottweillter mix who is an angel. Katie Rose is a 3 year old australian shepard and is a special needs dog. She is very energetic, sweet, and friendly. We love our babies! :O)

Cindy and Katie want to thank you for your business - They give their woof woof approval on all items. We believe that pets are part of the family; they should be spoiled and pampered! 

♥♥♥♥Please measure your pet and read size measurements carefully in each listing before purchasing.♥♥♥♥ 

All items are made in a smoke free, pet friendly environment.
results.sale_message: Cindy and Katie thank you for your business.

results.policy_welcome:
Welcome to Cheyenne2u – A mixture of Supplies and soon to be listed Hand Made items from my home to yours.

Quilting – Books, Patterns, Magazines, Tools.
Sewing – Crafts, Home Décor, Kid's, Men's and Women’s Patterns.

Our Motto: “Giving our best today is the recipe for a better tomorrow.”

Happy Shopping!
~ Kim, Cheyenne2u
Cheyenne2u@gmail.com
results.policy_payment: We currently only accept Paypal.  If you need to make other arrangements, please contact us personally.
results.policy_shipping:
Shipping is to USA only.
All items are shipped to the buyer with quality recycled packing materials and are packaged with utmost care.

All orders will be mailed USPS. We will notify you when your purchase is sent out with the delivery confirmation number so you will be able to track your purchase.
results.policy_refunds:
We L♥V happy Buyers!
We will refund your money for any item that is misrepresented in description and/or picture(s). Just contact us within 3 days of receipt to discuss your concerns.

Buyer accepts cost of returning item. Refund will be made in original form as transaction less any Seller’s fees.

All will be discussed in full prior to agreement of return.
results.policy_additional: Our customer information is kept secure and we will never pass personal information to third parties. We do not share, sell or trade e-mail addresses or any specific details about you or your household. We do not participate in or contribute to cooperative or shared databases.

results.title: Celebrities~movie stars~goddesses & others...
results.announcement:
Thank you for visiting my Etsy shop...I'm so happy you've found me! 

I've just been listing my "celebrities & others" jewelry designs here and will be adding fresh items as often as I create them. I hope you will check back to see my newest listings!

Please visit my Etsy sister shop, JTaylorDesign.etsy.com, where you will find my alter-ego jewelry made with vintage gems and stones, sparkly jewels, delicate antique filigree, all designed with an heirloom quality and Victorian look. 

~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~

Shipping:
Usually, all purchases are mailed to you within three days of receipt of payment excluding weekends. If there is going to be a delay, I will send you an email.

USA orders are sent via USPS First Class with delivery confirmation. If you would like insurance or expedited delivery, please let me know and I will be very happy to add that for you. 

Orders sent to customers outside the USA are mailed via First Class Mail International, and at this time there is no delivery confirmation or insurance available for those orders.

~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~

Please don't hesitate to send me a message if you have any questions or comments...I would love to hear from you!

~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~ ~*~

I will happily leave positive feedback for every buyer who has completed the transaction and left positive feedback for me. I value my customers, their satisfaction and their positive feedback. In the unlikely event you are not completely satisfied with the transaction, please contact me and I will do my best to resolve the problem.


Please view my shop policies before ordering.  Thank you!
results.sale_message:
Thank you very much, dear customer, for visiting my Etsy shop and purchasing one of my creations!  

I will ship your package promptly and hope that it will reach you quickly so that you may begin enjoying your new treasure.  

Warmest Regards, 
Jackie

results.title: beauty by Saria ~ Color.  Therapy.  Cosmetics.
results.announcement:
Welcome to beauty by Saria ~ The first & only Mineral Makeup formulated based on Ayurvedic Principles.

May 10, 2010

I am absolutely exhausted, but also thrilled to say that each and every order is now all set & ready to be delivered to the Post Office in the morning!

This means our lag time for order processing has been demolished!  We should be getting back to our normal Tuesday and Thursday shipping days this week.
_______________________________________________________________
*****************************************************************************************
Important Notice for All YouTube Gurus/Hosts

While we do appreciate and depend on reviews from bloggers, YouTubers, Ezines, etc., it is impossible to accommodate every request we receive. 

In addition, we have also established some brief criteria that MUST be met PRIOR to a request for product reviews.

** Minimum of 250 subscribers
** Minimum of 10 previous videos/blog entries
** Minimum of 6 months experience in social media format
** Must be 18 years of age or older
** NO EXCEPTIONS to ANY of the above criteria

Failure to meet minimum criteria & still request products for review will be considered spam and reported to Etsy Admin. 

All eligible requests are evaluated by beauty by Saria staff and accepted reviewers will be contacted via email or convo.    

Requests for reviews may be submitted once every 90 days.  Submissions made on a more frequent basis will be considered spam and reported to Etsy Admin. As well as being banned from any future submissions.

We are working on developing a formal reviewers guide and will keep you update on its progress.  
_______________________________________________________________
*****************************************************************************************
As always, should you have any questions about our products, don't hesitate to ask!  We are here to help!

Just a reminder that we FULLY DISCLOSE ALL INGREDIENTS for a product in each listing.  There are no surprises on the label when you receive your products from us!  


All product formulas, images, product names & descriptions are the sole property of beauty by Saria and cannot be reproduced, republished, downloaded or copied without express written permission from the owner!  This includes reposting photos, copy or text for use in blogs, forums, e-zines, or other online resources.  Violators will be pursued and prosecuted to fullest extent of the law.
results.sale_message:
Thank you for your purchase from beauty by Saria!  

We are currently experiencing a 2 week processing time on all orders.  This means that it will take up to 14 days before your order is processed & shipped.

We pride ourselves on customer service - including that personal touch you can't find anywhere else.  Should you have any questions about your purchase, or any of our products, please don't hesitate to convo us- we are here and happy to help!

Please note that we will be open limited hours – Operating ONLY on Wednesdays – and will resume full business hours on Monday, May 10, 2010.  All orders and convos received during this time will be addressed the following Wednesday.  We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your understanding during this time.    

We know you will enjoy your purchase – as we have enjoyed making each product for you.
Thanks again!

Wishing you Happiness & Technicolor dreams,

Maria
Owner/Creator beauty by Saria

results.title: Removable Wall Decals
results.announcement:

results.sale_message:
Thank you for placing your order with Surface Flik! 

Your order has been received and this message confirms it. If you'd like to inquire about your order, you may do so at any time by emailing us at info@surfaceflik.com with your Etsy username and order info. 

If you haven't specified your color, we will assume that your chosen colors are the ones shown on the front picture. If you'd like to change your color and you haven't told us in the message box to seller, please convo us as soon as you can!

TURN-AROUND TIME: ranges anywhere from 1 to 5 business days. Custom orders may take longer.

SHIPPING TIME: depends on your location (Please note that we are not responsible for shipping delays due to customs, extreme weather or any other circumstance)

USA - Shipped by Canada Post and turns into USPS when it enters USA. 

We ship by two methods:
Small Packet Air Mail: 4 to 10 business days (NO TRACKING AVAILABLE!)
Expedited Ground: 6 to 12 business days (TRACKING PROVIDED)

If you are in a rush, you may upgrade to EXPRESS POST which takes 3 to 5 business days to arrive. (The extra charge for this shipping is $15.00)

CANADA - shipped by Canada Post. All orders are shipped by Expedited Ground which take 1 to 7 business days to arrive. All shipments come with tracking and insurance. The upgrade to Express Post is $15.00.

International - shipped by Canada Post. 
All shipments are mailed by Small Packet Air Mail which take 6 to 12 business days to arrive. There is no tracking available for this shipping method.

***Please check your shipping address on your Etsy account***
All shipments will be shipped to that address. Please email us at info@surfaceflik.com if you need to change it!

PAYMENTS: All payments are required at check-out. We will not ship your package if we haven't received the full payment. Please check your PayPal account to verify that your payment went through. If you don't see the transaction, please contact us at your earliest convenience.

Thank you! Have a wonderful day :)
